| icon = poe2 pet_white_bird icon.png | description = While the Beakhead is following you, you gain a bonus to Intellect and your party gains a bonus to the Sleight of Hand skill. | added_in = poe2 | equipment_slot = Pet | item_type = Pet | item_category = Other item | requirements = | is_soulbound = no | is_unique = no | value = 60 | shop_value = 300 | range = | level1_spells = | level2_spells = | level3_spells = | level4_spells = | level5_spells = | level6_spells = | level7_spells = | level8_spells = | item_bonuses = | enchantments = Pet bonus: Attribute - Intellect;Pet party effect: Skill - Sleight of Hand | rel_quests = | rel_items = | rel_abilities = | rel_talents = | internalname = ITEM_PET_Bird_Seagull | location = * Contained in [The Captain's Footlocker](/theCaptainsFootlocker/), a reward for pre-ordering the game. | guid = 745e812f-006b-4475-baa6-921a6cd7c7bc }} '''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Pet }} from ''[the Captain's Footlocker](/theCaptainsFootlocker/)'', given as a reward for pre-ordering {{poe2}}. ## Description {{Description|Beakhead, the [white hawk](/whiteHawk/), took a liking to your [ship](/theDefiant/) soon after [you](/theWatcher/) arrived in the [Deadfire](/deadfireArchipelago/). Captains in the Deadfire are only as effective as their [crew](/party/), and with this jaunty first-mate by your side you're bound to find success at sea. {{#var:description}}}} ## Acquisition {{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}} ## Gallery The captain's footlocker Promo.jpg|Promo image for the [item pack](/theCaptainsFootlocker/) The captain's footlocker Presentation.png|link=File:The captain's footlocker Presentation.gif|In-game rendering of the items.
''Clicking the image will open a large animated GIF file.'' {{references|refs= [https://www.gog.com/game/pillars_of_eternity_ii_deadfire Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire - Pre-Order on GOG.com] [http://store.steampowered.com/app/560130/Pillars_of_Eternity_II_Deadfire/ Pre-purchase Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire on Steam] }}

{{Infobox item poe2 | name = {{pagename nd}} | icon = poe2 pet_white_bird icon.png | description = While the Beakhead is following you, you gain a bonus to Intellect and your party gains a bonus to the Sleight of Hand skill. | added_in = poe2 | equipment_slot = Pet | item_type = Pet | item_category = Other item | requirements = | is_soulbound = no | is_unique = no | value = 60 | shop_value = 300 | range = | level1_spells = | level2_spells = | level3_spells = | level4_spells = | level5_spells = | level6_spells = | level7_spells = | level8_spells = | item_bonuses = | enchantments = Pet bonus: Attribute - Intellect;Pet party effect: Skill - Sleight of Hand | rel_quests = | rel_items = | rel_abilities = | rel_talents = | internalname = ITEM_PET_Bird_Seagull | location = * Contained in [[The Captain's Footlocker]], a reward for pre-ordering the game. | guid = 745e812f-006b-4475-baa6-921a6cd7c7bc }} '''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Pet }} from ''[[the Captain's Footlocker]]'', given as a reward for pre-ordering {{poe2}}. == Description == {{Description|Beakhead, the [[white hawk]], took a liking to your [[The Defiant|ship]] soon after [[The Watcher|you]] arrived in the [[Deadfire Archipelago|Deadfire]]. Captains in the Deadfire are only as effective as their [[Party|crew]], and with this jaunty first-mate by your side you're bound to find success at sea. {{#var:description}}}} == Acquisition == {{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}} == Gallery == The captain's footlocker Promo.jpg|Promo image for the [[The Captain's Footlocker|item pack]] The captain's footlocker Presentation.png|link=File:The captain's footlocker Presentation.gif|In-game rendering of the items.
''Clicking the image will open a large animated GIF file.'' {{references|refs= [https://www.gog.com/game/pillars_of_eternity_ii_deadfire Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire - Pre-Order on GOG.com] [http://store.steampowered.com/app/560130/Pillars_of_Eternity_II_Deadfire/ Pre-purchase Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire on Steam] }}
title: Beakhead
